title: ISic001231. I.Sicily inscription 001231
body:
Facsimile Images

((ivy-leaf)) ((·)) Θ(εοῖς) ((·)) ((·)) Κ(αταχθονίοις) ((·)) ((ivy-leaf))
Ἀνδρόβιος ((·)) Λύκιος ((·)) ναύ-
κληρος ((·)) ἔζησε ((·)) ἀπ͡ρόσκοπτος ((·))
ἔτη ((·)) λϛ ((·)) Ἀπολλώνιος ((·)) σὺν
5Μουσαίῳ ((·)) καὶ Θεοδώρῳ ((·)) ἀ-
δελφῷ ((·)) ἰδίῳ ((·)) μ͡νήμης ((·)) εἵνεκεν

Apparatus criticus

Text based on I.Messina 29

English translation

To the underworld deities, Androbios Lukios, shipowner, lived without offence for 36 years. Erected by his brother Apollonios, with Mousiaos and Theodoros, for the memory of our brother

commentary
